taxon.author: (Thorell, 1895)
taxon.distribution: India, China, Taiwan, Hong Kong, Myanmar, Thailand, Laos, Vietnam, Malaysia (mainland, Borneo), Singapore, Indonesia (Borneo, Sumatra)

referenceObject.reference: Thorell, T. (1895). Descriptive catalogue of the spiders of Burma, based upon the collection made by Eugene W. Oates and preserved in the British Museum. London, 406 pp.
